2010/06/18 17:57:38

$ date '+%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S'

2010-06-18 17:57:58

$ date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'	
	
$ date +'%Y-%m-01 00:00:01'
2010-10-01 00:00:01

# date -d next-day +%Y%m%d
20060328
# date -d last-day +%Y%m%d
20060326
# date -d yesterday +%Y%m%d
20060326
# date -d tomorrow +%Y%m%d
20060328
# date -d last-month +%Y%m
200602
# date -d next-month +%Y%m
200604
# date -d next-year +%Y
2007
